#summary How to create femhub

== source distribution ==

{{{
git clone git://github.com/certik/femhub.git
cd femhub
git co -b femhub origin/femhub
cd spkg/standard/
./download_packages
cd ../../..
cp -a femhub femhub-3.4.2spd3femhub1
tar cf femhub-3.4.2spd3femhub1 femhub-3.4.2spd3femhub1.tar
}}}

== new release ==

{{{
git clone git://github.com/certik/femhub.git
cd femhub
git co -b femhub origin/femhub
cd spkg/standard/
./download_packages
vim sage_scripts/sage-banner  # edit the version & date in the banner
git ci -a -m "Femhub version bumped to 0.9.1"
git tag femhub-0.9.1
git push --tags git@github.com:certik/femhub.git
cd ../../..
cp -a femhub femhub-0.9.1
tar cf femhub-0.9.1.tar femhub-0.9.1
}}}

== binary distribution ==

Unpack it, move it to `femhub-0.9.1-ubuntu64`, change the platform name to one of: 
  * `ubuntu32`
  * `ubuntu64`
  * `debian32`
  * `debian64`
  * `gentoo64`
  * ...
then go into the directory, build it (just do `make`) and `tar.gz` it.
